text: Antonino Grano (1660–1718) was an Italian painter and engraver, principally active in Sicily. ==Sources== *https://web.archive.org/web/20110928122654/http://www.comune.palermo.it/archivio_biografico_comunale/schede/antonio_grano.htm ==External links== Category:1660 births Category:1718 deaths Category:Baroque painters Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:18th-century Italian painters Category:Sicilian painters Category:People from Palermo
title: Antonino Grano
